title: Global conflicts, cultural and social change

content.question: In the twentieth century, conflicts such as the two world wars and the Cold War occurred on a global scale. Develop an argument that evaluates the extent to which global conflicts led to cultural or social changes during this period.

frqParts.text: In the twentieth century, conflicts such as the two world wars and the Cold War occurred on a global scale. Develop an argument that evaluates the extent to which global conflicts led to cultural or social changes during this period.

topic.text: 7.5: Unresolved Tensions after World War I

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
